title: How to Make Cheese and Onion Snacks for a Party

steps.headline: Slide a cube of cheese onto the cocktail stick slowly, so that it does not break or crumble.
steps.description: Then, slice an onion down the cocktail stick, then a potato cube, and so on until the stick is full.

steps.headline: Make enough of these snacks for all your guests.
Arrange the snacks vertically in a clear or lightly colored tall glass.

text: Get together your supplies. See "Things You'll Need." Slide a cube of cheese onto the cocktail stick slowly, so that it does not break or crumble. Then, slice an onion down the cocktail stick, then a potato cube, and so on until the stick is full. Make enough of these snacks for all your guests.  Arrange the snacks vertically in a clear or lightly colored tall glass.
